acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle POJOs with constructors that have one or more self references to the POJO class, provided the required constructor is annotated with @PodamConstructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleConstructorsWithOneOrMoreSelfReferences

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ConstructorWithSelfReferencesPojoAndDefaultConstructor
Then the Object should not be null
Then the first self-reference for a POJO with default constructor should not be null
Then the second self-reference for a POJO with default constructor should not be null
